nodes.text: How are things going for you today?
I'm working on a little puzzle - the Librarian. Apparently, he worked at this castle before the University took over the castle. No one knows his name. He doesn't get paid. So what is he doing here?
I never see him leave this castle. He doesn't interact with the other instructors. All in all, the man's a mystery.
I like to solve mysteries, don't you, Sweetie? Would you like to help me with this one?
I'd be honored to help you any way I can, Sophia. I just like to see you smile at me.
You do say the sweetest things, Sugar.

options.text: Say Something Clever About the Librarian

nodes.text: You want me to look into the Librarian for you - so what is it specifically you want to know about him? Do you think he's some sort of threat?
He's an unknown factor here at the school. There are many secrets in this castle - and I bet he has many answers. However, he keeps them to himself.
I can check him out if you like.
I take it since you are asking for my help that your honeyed words and winning smile didn't get you very far with the Librarian...
<shrug> I haven't had many opportunities to deal with him directly since he stays mostly in the library or his private quarters.
So now you want me to use my charm and grace to weasel some random information from the Librarian, is that it?
It clearly disturbs you that the Librarian is such an enigma. Why does he bother you? It's not like he interferes with your job.

Life is a game - and I play to win. To win, you need to know the rules or engagement and understand the other players. I want to know more about the mysterious Librarian so that I can predict his behavior.
Seeing as you are one of those 'Disbarred Bards,' I thought that you could do a little after-hours inspection of his desk and the personal effects he leaves in the library.
That's all I'm asking of you, Handsome.

options.text: Agree To Spy on the Librarian
Tell Sophia About Searching the Librarian's Desk

nodes.text: I already searched the Librarian's desk. There's nothing personal there, and I haven't seen him do anything suspicious.
Well, wasn't that inventive of you, Sweetie!
You didn't find anything at all? Not even a journal?
You know I'd help a beautiful lady like you however I could. If I found anything, I'd tell you.
Of course you would. Just keep an eye on him for me, please, Honey? I'm sure he must be up to something.
Sure, I'll be happy to help you. I'll try to uncover all the dastardly secrets that the Librarian is hiding.
I knew I could count on you, Sugar.

options.text: Decline to Spy on the Librarian

nodes.text: I really don't want to get involved with spying on the Librarian.
Suit yourself, Sweetheart. I'll keep this in mind for the future.
Heard anything interesting recently?
Oh, I've heard a lot of interesting things, Sugar. Just tell me what you know first, then I'll share something of what I know.
Sorry, Sweetie, but it's been slow around here. Nothing new from me.
I'll see you later.
I look forward to our little talks, Honey.
